reviewText: Teen son LOVES this movie.  What's not to love?  Girls, cars, BBQ.

This si the second installment in the "Hot Chick Stoner BBQ" series and let me tell you this one is so much better than the first.  Real chicks, real cars and some real good recipes for anyone who has the munchies.  The Gorgonzola Burgers are something to behold!  Lots of great music, tips on changing your oil and great recipes to try out on all your stoner friends.  Skip the first one and pick this one up instead.
